glsa.title: GnuTLS: Denial of Service vulnerability
glsa.synopsis: The GnuTLS library is vulnerable to Denial of Service attacks.

background.p: GnuTLS is a free TLS 1.0 and SSL 3.0 implementation for the GNU project.

description.p: A vulnerability has been discovered in the record packet parsing in the GnuTLS library. Additionally, a flaw was also found in the RSA key export functionality.

impact.p: A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability and cause a Denial of Service to any application that utilizes the GnuTLS library.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
